--- title: Version Control author: Stat 251 date: '2024-01-26' categories: - Week01 - slides format: revealjs engine: knitr '...': categories: - Week01 - slides date: '2024-01-26' pub-date: '2023-01-01' pub-date: '2023-01-01' --- ## Version Control ![Version control is the answer to this file naming problem.
[Image Source](https://phdcomics.com/comics/archive.php?comicid=1531) "Piled Higher and Deeper" by Jorge Cham www.phdcomics.com](https://phdcomics.com/comics/archive/phd101212s.gif){width="50%"} ## Introduce yourself to git In a system terminal, run... ::: {.cell hash='02-version-control_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_99b4233c074417708a0fd3b0004f2dee'} ```{.bash .cell-code} git config --global user.name 'YOUR NAME HERE' git config --global user.email 'YOUR EMAIL HERE' git config --global --list # check to see it worked ``` ::: ## Set up SSH authentication [Instructions](https://happygitwithr.com/ssh-keys.html) ## Navigating around Github (Demo) ## Using RStudio and git (Demo) ## Homework: Introduction to Github [Link](../homework/01-git-github.qmd)
